snippet.title: MechWarrior: Living Legends - The Journey So Far (An Asset Lineup Review), now in Higher Quality™
snippet.description:
A celebration and overview of all assets added to MWLL since the Community Edition team got dev'ing. In no particular order, this vid covers all 16 of them - from versions 0.8.0 to 0.12.2! Organized and put together by lead sound dev CWG Andrew. Full credits list at end of vid.
Scores used:

- Battle Sequence by James Woods
- Extremity Extinct by Mike Jennings
- Living Legends V2 by Moreh & Zuhr

Animated graph credit: Data Encryption via Pixabay


MechWarrior: Living Legends is an award-winning fan-made total conversion mod for Crysis Wars, released in 2009, featuring a unique combined-arms experience unlike any MechWarrior game before it or after. Following its successful development revival effort in late 2016, MWLL has since become a stand-alone mod - meaning you don't need to own Crysis Wars to play anymore!



Main site: https://mechlivinglegends.net/



Join our Discord community at https://discord.gg/QymgXdp

Check us out on ModDB, as well, at https://www.moddb.com/mods/mechwarrior-living-legends
